resources.string: Guide: Check the status of your assets, find more about this app or use upper right corner to see other options.

This app is developed under GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3.


An Android app that makes it easy to gather data from various assets to one place. With powerful use of web API, user can get fresh data of assets of they like from the Internet. Fresh data makes it easy to follow and analyze various crypto- and blockchain-asset's values and holdings. With this app user can get complete and up to date information of his/her assets.


Main features:
 *Powerful web API to get fresh data from the Internet
 *Add and remove assets
 *Edit asset data
 *Store app data in secure Internal storage, where only user's app have access
 *App is using ListView-ArrayAdapter implementation to be as memory efficient as possible


Developed by JukioKe.
